text: All of the spanish (es) server error messages are 'semi' translated or textually translated, which should not be the case. As far as I would say, translations for errors should be made such that the end user can understand what is going on. So I am submitting translations that do exactly that. contact: Content-language: es Content-type: text/html Body:----------es-- Si usted cree que esto es un error del servidor, por favor comuníqueselo al ">administrador del portal. ----------es--
creator: alejandro@lay.com.mx
